about_the_game:
Deactivate the dark gems and defeat the witch Oculla to avoid a demonic invasion!

The witch Oculla has made a pact with the demons that will provoke a new demonic invasion on Earth. She managed to find and reactivate the Dark Gems that will permit the reopening of prohibited diabolic portal that was sealed in the past. She is on the ruins of the unholy zone and is going to use her power to get it.
This evil plan has been discovered by the Light Brotherhood. The Light Gems automatically return to be activated when the dark gems are reactivated.
So dictates destiny!

GAME

The game consists of two phases:

- In the first phase you must absorb the energy balls of the same color using corresponding light gems. The light gems will acumullate energy that you can shoot at the the dark gems to weaken them.
Game will autosave when you weaken a dark gem by 50% and by 100%. More concrete details in the section "How to play" when you start a game.


- In the second phase, after you deactivated the dark gems, you will fight against Oculla in a turn-based combat where you will have a serie of actions that you must choose in convenience.

The election of the initial character and your ability in the first phase can be determinant in the final combat.


FEATURES:
- Two game styles in one.
- Autosave (save points) and load games.
- Steam cloud.
- Steam overlay.
- List of scores (local).
- Achievements (Steam and local).


NOTES:
- The game requires the "Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2022 redistributable x64" package for the correct functioning of the Steam features linked to the game. It will give an error when running the game if this package is not installed. Steam will install this package the first time you run the game.
- The game is designed to be used with mouse or touch. For the first stage of the game it is also possible to use some keyboard keys.

name: Bewitched Balls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bits or higher
  • Processor: Pentium B940 2 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics (Sandy Bridge) or equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: * The game requires the "Microsoft Visual C++ 2015-2022 redistributable x64" package for Steam features linked to the game to work properly. (Steam has to install it automatically the first time you run the game) * Minimum requirements based on a test environment consisting of a fresh install of Windows with 4gb ram, a resolution of 1366x768 and running the game with the image option selected on normal (default). * The game may run on lower processors or graphics cards, but depending on the hardware characteristics, screen resolution and image mode selected within the game, the game experience may not be optimal.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bewitched Balls is partly a color matching arcade puzzle game and partly a turn-based combat game set in a world of magic and fantasy where your goal is to defuse six evil gems and finally fight against a powerful witch.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian
